name: PinkTurtle_WIP
description:
Theres potentially a small hickup on when starting a new game, its normal, I haven't added loading screens to that yet.

Saving/Loading is potentially broken, and might just start a new game instead of loading the saved one, I recommend not using it. It also may cause a Fatal Error, crashing the game.

Controls:

W,A,S,D - Movement

LMB - Interact / Attack

RMB - Block

F - Draw/Stow Weapon

Tab / B / I - Inventory

C / P - Character menu

N / J / L - Journal

Esc - Menu
